amendment.description: An amendment numbered 13 printed in Part B of House Report 116-366 to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to review and develop effluent standards, pretreatment standards, and water quality criteria for PFAS under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment requires the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to review and develop effluent standards, pretreatment standards, and water quality criteria for PFAS under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 168 (Roll no. 11).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pappas amendment (A012) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 168 (Roll no. 11).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Pappas.
